subject: Files access on yahoo groups
msgSnippet: Hi there, Just wondering if its intentional that the files section of the yahoo groups is not available to guests?  Its a wee bit inconvenient if you don t
messageBody:
Hi there,
Just wondering if its intentional that the files section of the yahoo groups
is not available to guests? Its a wee bit inconvenient if you don't have a
yahoo ID.
Cheers
Shez
